title: [K-12] Conceptual Metaphor-based Mathematics MOOC Design and Learning Support Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental mathematical concepts and problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment for acquiring advanced mathematical concepts for non-degree purposes

learning_goals: Learners can visually represent the structural relationships of mathematical concepts using the "subway map" metaphor.
Learners can explain mathematical problem-solving steps by linking them to spatial memory systems using the Loci Method.
Learners can autonomously design and modify learning pathways through the MOOC navigation system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
